programme.title: Oga And Friends

programme.title: Oga And Friends
programme.desc: Oga dan rakan-rakan berdepan dengan Monitron, ketua Cerobot, yang menerima cabaran badminton 2v2 penuh muslihat. Oga berganding dengan Reemo, tetapi sikap degil Reemo mungkin menghalang kemenangan mereka.

programme.title: Oh My English! Musim Ke-2
programme.desc: Penggal baharu baru sahaja bermula di SMK Ayer Dalam. En. Henry Middleton telah mengubah fikirannya untuk tidak kembali ke UK. Dia ingin menyambung tugasnya di Kelas 3 Merah, dan belajar lebih mendalam tentang negara yang kini bergelar rumah baharunya. Dengan kehadiran guru kegemaran di sisi, Kelas 3 Merah kini bersedia meneruskan pembelajaran mereka dengan lebih ceria pada penggal baharu. Apakah yang berlaku apabila guru-guru dan pelajar-pelajar baharu seperti Cikgu Malik (Aaron Aziz), Cikgu Ayu (Tiz Zaqyah), Azlan (Syafie Naswip) serta Hani (Iezah Dyana), menyertai mereka ? Ikuti rancangan ini!

programme.title: Super Nabil

programme.title: Super Nabil

programme.title: Oh My English! Musim Ke-2 (HD)
programme.desc: Penggal baharu baru sahaja bermula di SMK Ayer Dalam. En. Henry Middleton telah mengubah fikirannya untuk tidak kembali ke UK. Dia ingin menyambung tugasnya di Kelas 3 Merah, dan belajar lebih mendalam tentang negara yang kini bergelar rumah baharunya. Dengan kehadiran guru kegemaran di sisi, Kelas 3 Merah kini bersedia meneruskan pembelajaran mereka dengan lebih ceria pada penggal baharu. Apakah yang berlaku apabila guru-guru dan pelajar-pelajar baharu seperti Cikgu Malik (Aaron Aziz), Cikgu Ayu (Tiz Zaqyah), Azlan (Syafie Naswip) serta Hani (Iezah Dyana), menyertai mereka ? Ikuti rancangan ini!

programme.title: Oh My English! Musim Ke-2 (HD)
programme.desc: Penggal baharu baru sahaja bermula di SMK Ayer Dalam. En. Henry Middleton telah mengubah fikirannya untuk tidak kembali ke UK. Dia ingin menyambung tugasnya di Kelas 3 Merah, dan belajar lebih mendalam tentang negara yang kini bergelar rumah baharunya. Dengan kehadiran guru kegemaran di sisi, Kelas 3 Merah kini bersedia meneruskan pembelajaran mereka dengan lebih ceria pada penggal baharu. Apakah yang berlaku apabila guru-guru dan pelajar-pelajar baharu seperti Cikgu Malik (Aaron Aziz), Cikgu Ayu (Tiz Zaqyah), Azlan (Syafie Naswip) serta Hani (Iezah Dyana), menyertai mereka ? Ikuti rancangan ini!

programme.title: Having Fun Together
programme.desc: Two veterans and two junior idols bridge the generational gap by embarking on an immersive self-guided trip to explore the local cultures, natural landmarks and charming attractions.

programme.title: Rally for Love
programme.desc: The story starts with Malaysian badminton player Tang Jia Jie, who travel to Taiwan in search of the famous coach Xue Zhong Yong, who abandoned his mother, in an attempt to avenge her. Celebrating the anniversary of Astro Hua Hee Dai And Taiwans Formosa TV, this sport series feature cameos from top badminton players including Goh Liu Ying, Li Yang, Wang Chi Lin And Wang Tzu Wei.

programme.title: Everybody Needs Good Luck
programme.desc: Orphan Lucky is stubbornly optimistic despite the hardships she faces. After unfortunate events result in her losing loved ones, she learns to create a better life for herself And her remaining family.

programme.title: Hua Hee Seko-lah
programme.desc: In the wake of its popular local Hokkien drama Hua Hee Everyday, Hua Hee Dai presents a new Hokkien comedy, Hua Hee Seko-lah! A teacher, who volunteers to teach Mandarin in a Hokkien village, finds himself up against its Hokkien community whose old habits die hard. Living alongside the villagers, the teacher slowly redirects his hard-headed students towards Mandarin in its purest form, while personally experiencing the beauty of Hokkien culture.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Its Little Angel! Where baby John, his brother, Jack, and sister, Jill inspire kids and families to have fun and to grow and learn through play. Come sing along!

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: My Magic Pet Morphle follows the adventures of Mila and her magical morphing pet, Morphle. Whether they need to stop a magic pet who doesnt know how to control their powers, the town Bandits from stealing things, or the mischievous Orphle from causing havoc, Mila and Morphle always work together to help out!

programme.title: Oddbods
programme.desc: Oddbods follows the wacky adventures of seven unique and furry friends, who laugh, play and get up to mischief in their hometown of Oddsville, where even the most ordinary of situations have unexpected consequences.

programme.title: T-Rex Ranch
programme.desc: T-Rex Ranch brings you another awesome fun-packed collection of Jurassic dinosaur videos ! Watch your favorite park rangers get into all sorts of wonderful adventures, coming across lots of scary dinosaurs, awesome toys and much more!

programme.title: Antiks
programme.desc: When youre a middle child in a colony of thousands, getting lost in a crowd is all too easy. And if theres one thing Joey and Boo know all too well, its how to get lost and make it look easy! Every day their insatiable curiosity sends them on a journey into the great unknown, where they must make sense of the big wide world at a grass-roots level. Antiks tosses kids comedy deep into the undergrowth: its colorful, fun, and just a little dangerous.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Army commando-robot ARPO has been assigned his toughest mission yet: babysitter! With a built-in radar system that scans for danger and an arsenal of baby gear set to deploy at a moments notice, ARPO is programmed to protect. As simple tasks like bath time, feeding, taking a nap, and changing diapers somehow turn into action-packed adventures thanks to Dannys curiosity, ARPO has his work cut out for him.

programme.title: Isteri Separuh Masa
programme.desc: Bagi Nazrin Shah, Medina Izwanilah punca mama dan papanya tidak menerima kekasihnya, Zita sebagai menantu. Lebih teruk apabila mereka dijodohkan oleh nenek mereka. Lakonan Emma Maembong, Ayda Jebat dan Aiman Hakim.

programme.title: Isteri Separuh Masa
programme.desc: Bagi Nazrin Shah, Medina Izwanilah punca mama dan papanya tidak menerima kekasihnya, Zita sebagai menantu. Lebih teruk apabila mereka dijodohkan oleh nenek mereka. Lakonan Emma Maembong, Ayda Jebat dan Aiman Hakim.

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Icha dan Umai merasa sangat bersalah terhadap Oya dan cuba untuk memohon maaf. Semua pelajar risau dengan tugasan yang diberikan oleh pensyarah mereka.

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Mika mahu Oya menolong membuat tugasannya jika tidak mahu rahsia Oya terbongkar. Pertemuan Oya dengan kawan lamanya, Jaja membuatkan Oya merasa bersemangat untuk belajar semula.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Sikap prihatin dan baik Rohana terhadap Ainnura akhirnya terbongkar apabila tujuan Rohana merestui hasrat Fariz untuk megahwini Ainnura hanyalah semata-mata untuk membalas dendam pada Ainnura. Rohana paksa Ainnura tinggal bersamanya dan jika Ainnura menujuk Fariz supaya keluar dari rumah tersebut, dia tidak halal susu yang diminum oleh Fariz serta menganggap Fariz anak derhaka. Sementara itu, dalam diam Ilah sebenarnya merindui Ainnura.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Rohana sengaja menyeksa fizikal dan mental Ainnura. Fazira melihat apa yang dilakukan oleh Rohana terhadap Ainnura lalu mendesak Ainnura dan Fariz keluar dari rumah tersebut. Bagaimanapun Ainnura enggan kerana tidak mahu Fariz dianggap sebagai anak derhaka. Gara-hara terlalu marah dengan Ainnura, Rohana telah menghentak kepala Ainnura ke dinding. Fariz perasan dengan bengkak di kepala Ainnura.

programme.title: Sayang Papa Saya Tak
programme.desc: Farish who has just lost his wife is married to his sons caretaker, Raisya. Did they manage to keep their tested relationship strong even though they have to go through various obstacles?

programme.title: Well be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: Well be back at 6.00am

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Ainnura berbohong dengan Fariz yang bengkak di kepalanya akiat terhantuk pada sinki. Dalam waktu yang sama, Rohana mendakwa Ainnura sengaja menolaknya sehinggakan dia hampir terjatuh. Fateha menyokong kata-kata Rohana, menyebabkan Fariz keliru siapakah yang benar di antara isteri dan ibunya. Ainnura bangkit mempertahankan haknya. Selain daripada Ainnura, Fawwaz turut menjadi mangsa Rohana dan Fateha dengan pelbagai penghinaan sehingga akhirnya kerana tidak sanggup melihat Fawwaz dihina, Fazira mengakui yang Fawwaz adalah anaknya.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Fateha dan Rohana terkejut apabila mengetahui Fawwaz adalah anak Fazira hasil hubungan terlarang dengan Raja Azali iaitu kekasih Fateha. Pada mulanya mereka tidak percaya tetapi ketika mereka hendak mendapatkan penjelasan daripada Raja Azali, Raja Azali telah ditangkap polis atas beberapa tuduhan merogol. Fariz meminta maaf di atas sikap Rohana selama ini. Ainnura telah lama memaafkan Rohana tetapi mahu Fariz menceraikannya kerana dia tidak mahu Fariz menjadi anak derhaka gara-garanya. Rohana terharu dengan sikap baik Ainnura dan merayu kemaafan daripada Ainnura.

programme.title: Sayang Papa Saya Tak
programme.desc: Farish who has just lost his wife is married to his sons caretaker, Raisya. Did they manage to keep their tested relationship strong even though they have to go through various obstacles?

Fariz meminta maaf di atas sikap Rohana selama ini. Ainnura telah lama memaafkan Rohana tetapi mahu Fariz menceraikannya kerana dia tidak mahu Fariz menjadi anak derhaka gara-garanya. Rohana terharu dengan sikap baik Ainnura dan merayu kemaafan daripada Ainnura.

programme.title: Sayang Papa Saya Tak
programme.desc: Farish who has just lost his wife is married to his sons caretaker, Raisya. Did they manage to keep their tested relationship strong even though they have to go through various obstacles?

programme.title: Sayang Papa Saya Tak
programme.desc: Farish who has just lost his wife is married to his sons caretaker, Raisya. Did they manage to keep their tested relationship strong even though they have to go through various obstacles?

programme.title: Well be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: Well be back at 6.00am

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Setelah berusaha, akhirnya Fariz berjaya mengajak Ainnura keluar. Fariz berterus terang yang dia masih sayangkan Ainnura. Ainnura serba salah kerana dia tahu yang Datuk Rashid mahu menjodohkan Fariz dengan anaknya, Rania. Dalam waktu yang sama, Datuk Rashid juga cuba mengeratkan hubungan Ainnura dengan Reza.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Tok Wan kurang senang apabila mengetahui Ainnura menjalin semula hubungan dengan Fariz. Dia mahu Ainnura putuskan hubungan dengan Fariz. Justeru, Tok Wan menyokong usaha Ilah untuk menjodohkan Ainnura dengan pemuda pilihan Ilah. Demi cintanya pada Ainnura, Fariz saggup berdepan dengan Tok Wan dalam usaha merayu Tok Wan agar merestui hubungan mereka berdua sebagaimana yang pernah Tok Wan lakukan enam tahun lalu.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Rania cuba menarik perhatian Fariz tetapi usahanya sia-sia. Akhirnya Rania menyerah kalah dan yakin cinta Fariz bukan miliknya. Bagaimanapun Datuk Rashid mendesak Rania supaya usaha lagi dan jangan mudah mengaku kalah. Dia mahu Fariz menjadi menantunya demi legasi syarikat mereka. Sementara itu, kesungguhan Fariz untuk mendapatkan semula Ainnura telah melembutkan hati Tok Wan. Dalam usaha membantu Fariz, Tok Wan sengaja merancangkan sesuatu untuk merapatkan hubungan Fariz dengan Ainnura dan Fawwaz.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Tindakan Tok Wan merapatkan hubungan Ainnura dengan Fariz menimbulkan kemarahan Ilah. Ilah tetap berkeras untuk jodohkan Ainnura dengan lelaki pilihannya. Apabila Ainnura tidak setuju dengan pilihan Ilah, Tok Wan sengaja membuat dalih untuk kahwinkan Ainnura dengan Aidel iaitu kawan rapat Ainnura, bukannya dengan Fariz. Sementara itu, Rohana sudah membayangkan akan bermenantukan anak Datuk apabila Datuk Rashid menjemputnya mereka makan tengah hari sambil berbincang dengan perkahwinan Rania dengan Fariz.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Ainnura akhirnya bersedia untuk berkahwin dengan Fariz untuk kali kedua tetapi memberi syarat supaya Rohana sendiri yang meminangnya. Fariz juga tidak dibenarkan mempersoalkan siapa Fawwaz yang sebenarnya kerana Fawwaz bukan anak kandung Fariz sebagaimana yang disangkakan oleh Fariz. Beberapa hari sebelum pernikahan Ainnura dan Fariz, Tok Wan meninggal dunia akibat terjatuh di bilik air.

programme.title: Tomorrow Today
programme.desc: Developments and trends in research: From space travel to environmental conservation, from genetic engineering to medical innovations, Tomorrow Today has the scoop on science.

programme.title: Shift
programme.desc: How is the Internet changing society in Germany and around the world? The magazine for digital culture, issues and technology, delivered directly from blogs and boardrooms.

programme.title: Kecundang Sebelum Menjanda
programme.desc: Hari terbahagia dalam hidup Nora berubah menjadi suram bila tunangnya menarik diri pada hari pernikahan mereka. Tambah buruk lagi, hari selepas tragedi itu asyik berulang atas sebab-sebab misteri.

programme.title: Aku Raja Lawak
programme.desc: Silah nak jadi pelawak yang terkenal, cuma di kampungnya tak ada peluang pekerjaan pelawak sepenuh masa. Tapi dia tetap mendapat sokongan padu daripada peminat nombor satunya iaitu Faris, anaknya.

programme.title: Bayangan Emilia
programme.desc: Rita berpindah masuk ke banglo Ungku Mahmud dan mula merasai akan kehadiran roh yang seperti tidak senang dengan kehadirannya disitu. Apakah misteri di sebalik rumah banglo tersebut?

programme.title: Oh Speak English Please
programme.desc: Kisah Sally anak remaja moden yang merasa malu dengan ibunya kerana tidak pandai berbahasa Inggeris dan berketrampilan agak kekampungan. Lakonan Rozita Che Wan dan Zahirah MacWilson.

programme.title: Striker Hati Ayah
programme.desc: Sofia susah untuk memilih antara dua calon, Raf atau Noah. Lalu meminta pendapat ayahnya, Adam. Kini dua lelaki tersebut terpaksa memenangi hati ayah Sofia, seorang peminat fanatik bola.

programme.title: Gebu Gebu Manis
programme.desc: Kisah Hamdi dan Dolah yang memulakan perniagaan dodol tetapi sering disabotaj oleh Amira yang cemburu dengan perniagaan dua orang sahabat ini.

programme.title: Perangkap Perkahwinan
programme.desc: Three best friends promised to get married, at the same time when they turn 26 years old. Their perceptions of marriage life begin to change and conflict ensues.

programme.title: Cik Puan Sinderella
programme.desc: This is a lighthearted family drama about a teenage girl who is closely guarded by her mother.

programme.title: Anak Kerak
programme.desc: Husin telah menggunakan ilmu hitam iaitu dengan Anak Kerak demi untuk mendapatkan kekebalan, kesenangan dan kemewahan hidup di dunia

programme.title: Jatuh Cinta Buta
programme.desc: Telefilem komedi romantik tentang perkenalan singkat di antara Zulin, seorang gadis yang tidak pernah bercinta, dengan Izlan, seorang duda dalam satu blind date yang diaturkan oleh Nadya Ramanshah.

programme.title: Matahari
programme.desc: Fauzi seorang guru yang telah dihantar untuk berkhidmat di Sabah. Di sana dia telah berkenalan dengan seorang novelis yang sedang mengalami masalah writers block iaitu Yazid.

programme.title: Well be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: Well be back at 6.00am

programme.title: Meniti Cinta Di Starimost
programme.desc: Iman dipaksa berkahwin dengan Qaseh, anak kepada orang gajinya untuk mewarisi harta bapanya. Percutian mereka di Bosnia membuahkan bibit-bibit cinta. Lakonan Iqram Dinzly, Zarina Zainoordin dan Yana Shamsudin.

programme.title: Jula Juli Bintang Putus Cinta
programme.desc: Telemovie sekuel Jula Juli Bintang Cinta kini kembali! Kali ini, Jula dan Juli mengalami konflik percintaan dengan Dani And Izham sehingga mereka memutuskan untuk berpisah dan melarikan diri ke kampung Juli.

programme.title: Kampung Kuala Lambat
programme.desc: Kampung Kuala Lambat bagai mengalami sumpahan apabila lelaki yang berkahwin muda akan mati di hari pernikahan mereka namun kejadian ganjil ini tidak berlaku kepada lelaki yang berusia 60 tahun ke atas.

programme.title: Musnahkan Pelamin Anganku
programme.desc: Mikael yang merupakan seorang wedding planner menerima tawaran besar untuk menjayakan sebuah majlis perkahwinan pelanggannya. Namun majlis perkahwinan tersebut merupakan majlis bekas isterinya.

programme.title: Dua
programme.desc: Kisah Farhan yang kehilangan kembarnya Fahrin dalam satu kemalangan tragis. Dia kemudiannya mengambil-alih kehidupan Fahrin namun terperangkap dalam sebuah cinta tiga segi pula. Lakonan Eusoff Hashim dan Sharifah Sakinah.

programme.title: Racun Menantu
programme.desc: After marrying Zain, Sara lived in the same house with Pak Dolah, her father-in-law. Because of the familys grudge, Sara started making trouble by seducing her own father-in-law.

programme.title: Cupid
programme.desc: Kisah mengenai seorang ejen yang bekerja di sebuah syarikat penghancur jodoh yang ditugaskan untuk memikat seorang wanita supaya dapat melupakan suaminya yang telah diisytiharkan meninggal dunia. Namun dia jatuh cinta pada wanita tersebut

programme.title: Cerai
programme.desc: Pengalaman berkurung dengan pasangan selama musim PKP memaksa dua pasangan suami isteri menilai semula perkahwinan mereka yang telah disalah ertikan selama ini.

programme.title: Hingga Jumpa Lagi
programme.desc: Eva is diagnosed with cancer and prays that she could travel back to the past in order to prevent the love between her and her husband so that her husband can lead a happy life. Her prayer is granted

programme.title: I Heart You Cik Yah
programme.desc: Zulkefli and Badariah are always arguing, but in order to prevent the factory where they work from being closed by Qarina, they must work together. Out of hatred, they start feeling for each other.

programme.title: Jihan Nak Displin Anak
programme.desc: Jihan dan suami kalut apabila anak mereka tidak mahu pulang beraya di kampung. Mereka cuba untuk mendisiplinkan anak mereka sebelum hari raya

programme.title: Satu Kampung Dua Orang
programme.desc: Selepas banjir besar melanda, semua penduduk kampung berpindah kerana kampung mereka tidak lagi selamat. Hanya dua beradik yang enggan berpindah atas sebab dan alasan mereka tersendiri.

programme.title: Jamil Balik Kampung
programme.desc: Kisah perjalanan Jamil pulang ke kampung untuk meminang kekasihnya setelah pinangannya pernah ditolak beberapa kali. Berjayakah misi Jamil kali ini?

programme.title: Well be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: Well be back at 6.00am

programme.title: Sampai Nanti
programme.desc: Kyle dan Milly bertemu kembali setelah 10 tahun terpisah dan cinta lama kembali terjalin. Tetapi adakah cinta mereka akan terus kekal hingga ke akhirnya?

programme.title: Asam Pedas Cendol Sejoli
programme.desc: Karim adalah pemilik kedai cendol bersebelahan dengan kedai asam pedas Kalsom. Mereka bermusuhan, tetapi anak mereka Kinah dan Khalil mencintai satu sama lain, dan terpaksa menyembunyikan perkara ini bagi mengelakkan perang antara dua kedai mereka.

programme.title: Tolong Saya Encik Dinosaur
programme.desc: Elly berpindah dari bandar ke pekan kecil untuk mencari ketenangan. Tetapi kenangan buruk tetap menghantui dirinya, sehinggalah dia bertemu dengan Karl yang mengajarnya erti sebuah kebahagiaan.

programme.title: Project Legion
programme.desc: A young man trapped in his apartment with a swarm of demons outside his door must find a way to survive the night and escape from apartment 213.

programme.title: Heartbreakers
programme.desc: Max and Page, a brilliant mother-daughter swindler team, target the citys wealthiest men. Max marries them and then sues for alimony after she catches them involved in an affair with Page.

programme.title: The Commando
programme.desc: A DEA agent returns home with PTSD after a botched mission and must now protect his family from a home invasion when a recently freed convict and his henchmen come after their stash of millions hidden inside of the agents home.

programme.title: The Competition
programme.desc: No information available

programme.title: The Legion
programme.desc: Noreno, a half-Roman, is entrusted with the mission of crossing the snowy mountains of Armenia, swarming with Parthian patrols, to seek help for his slowly dying men.

programme.title: Come Out Fighting
programme.desc: During WWII, the American army have raced their way through the countryside on the border of France entering Nazi Germany. Hitler has deployed his secret weapon. Lieutenant Frank Ross encounters the Nazi weapon and an intense aerial battle ensues.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - A Song To Kill For
programme.desc: Max Mayfair has it all; a beautiful girlfriend, Ava, a new London crime family, and thanks to his latest heist, a priceless diamond necklace. However, when mafioso Calbones henchmen catch up with Mike and Armen, determined to drag them back to New York to pay for their crimes, Max has everything to lose. Teaming up with his old friend, Marseille Mafia crime boss, Paul, Max hatches a plan to lure the New York Mafia to Mayfair.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - Serenas Game
programme.desc: Refusing to comply with Tommys demands, Max and Paul conspire to have the British gangster eliminated and Serena arrested. With Tommy dead and Serena in handcuffs, it appears as though Max has succeeded. His plan goes awry, however, when MI6 force Max to help Serena bring down her employers: the Russian mob. Torn between a life of crime with Serena or happiness with Ava, nothing is ever simple in the life of Max Mayfair.

programme.title: Altitude
programme.desc: A female FBI agent is offered millions to help a thief escape from a hijacked airplane.

programme.title: In Isolation
programme.desc: Four friends wanted to get away from it all in a remote country house but when a mysterious injured man turns up on their doorstep telling tales of a city ravaged by a epidemic and the looters who have pursued him, the friends rally to help.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - The Spyce Of Life
programme.desc: Returning from a romantic getaway with Ava, Max finds himself on the wrong side of the law yet again. Now blackmailed by MI6, Max must spy on two suspected terrorists; Aziz and Omar, who are regular customers at his club. Accompanied by his London crime family, Max breaks into Omars country estate and discovers his sinister plan. With everything on the line, Max must race to uncover a highly skilled hackers identity before its too late.

programme.title: Any Bullet Will Do
programme.desc: Two Brothers find themselves on opposing sides of the fight as one hopes to help abolish slavery while the other believes it is his God-given right.

programme.title: Come Out Fighting
programme.desc: During WWII, the American army have raced their way through the countryside on the border of France entering Nazi Germany. Hitler has deployed his secret weapon. Lieutenant Frank Ross encounters the Nazi weapon and an intense aerial battle ensues.

programme.title: Blindfire
programme.desc: A police officer who while responding to a violent hostage call, kills the African American suspect only to later learn of his innocence. Sensing this was a set-up, and facing repercussions, he must track down the person responsible while examining his own accountability and the ingrained racism which brought him to this point.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Hayes Hodges, an attorney, takes up the offer of defending his friend Colonel Terry Childers, accused of ordering his squad to open fire on a group of demonstrators.

programme.desc: A single mother must protect her daughter and herself during a heist gone wrong at a high-tech storage facility.

programme.title: Finland Papa

programme.desc: Come along on fun adventures as Blippi journeys off in his BlippiMobile to answer burning questions such as How does a rainbow get its colors? and why is Blippis popsicle melting?. Luckily he has his faithful sidekicks TABBS and D.BO to help him find the answers.

programme.title: KiiYii
programme.desc: KiiYii is a gaming, musical adventure show for preschoolers. Join Kii and Yii on their action-packed adventures round the magical playmat where they join their friends to play much-loved childrens games.

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Buster is a cute and cheeky little bus with an adventurous spirit and an inquisitive mind. More than anything else, he loves exploring his high-tech hometown Wheelieville, riding into adventures both big and small with his vehicle friends The Bumper Bunch.

programme.desc: Its Christmas Eve, but Santa has an accident and wont be able to fly his sleigh. Its a race against time, but Buster is up for the challenge!

programme.title: JJs Animal Time

JJ goes on a big adventure when he buys some magic beans that grow into a giant beanstalk. The friends play a game of hide-and-seek and JJ spends the day with his bestie, Boba the bear. After a fun day, its time to have a clean-up dance party!

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Get ready for a farming sing-along! When Ella is feeling anxious, she does the five senses shakedown to feel better. She and Rishi play a game of I Hear With My Little Ear to find all the animals on the farm. Do the ABC dance, go stargazing with Grandma Mei and take care of five mischievous monkeys. Plus, learn that its okay to make mistakes and that tidying up can be fun.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Get ready for some singing fun at Lellobee City Farm! Learn your ABCs in the Boogie Barn and then learn how to wash your hands before eating some delicious dumplings. Help Ella play Mummy Duck and keep all the baby ducks together. When accidents happen, sing a boo boo song to feel better. End the day with a special Chinese lullaby from Grandma Mei at a sleepover.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum: Lullabies
programme.desc: Little Baby Bum is here to help you fall to sleep with soothing, relaxing animated lullabies. These gentle and sensory videos are accompanied by lullaby versions of much-loved nursery rhymes, helping to take you to the land of nod.

programme.title: Oddbods: Short
programme.desc: Welcome to the wonderfully weird world of the Oddbods! This collection of bite-size adventures follows seven colorful friends with very big, and very different, personalities. Whether its Fuses hot-headedness, Pogos pranks, or Zees laziness, their unique traits clash in spectacular fashion. Watch as simple, everyday situations spiral into unpredictable and hilarious mayhem, proving that with the Oddbods, life is never, ever dull.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: When a boo-boo or a cough slows JJ down, he learns that a visit to the doctor can be a positive experience. Join him as he gets a check-up and finds out that doctors are friendly helpers who can make us feel better. This story shows that with a little care, youll be back on your feet in no time.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Its time for a learning sing-along! The family has a fun day at the beach and learns how to be safe. Baby John learns how to mix colors to make new ones and figures out whats inside his birthday presents. The family goes on an adventure and gets lost in a corn maze. Baby John learns that its okay to cry when you get a boo-boo and the difference between tall and short.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Its time to do the scarecrow dance! Help Sunny the Scarecrow scare away some pesky pigeons to protect the farms crops. Its harvest time, so everyone helps pick the vegetables. Find a safe and quiet place for a hedgehog to hibernate for the winter. Plus, sing a song about Pablo the Pig and Carlos the Calf and get ready for a campfire sing-along.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Its always cool to be cool on Lellobee City Farm! A penguin visits and teaches everyone how to stay cool on a hot day. A new rooster is having trouble remembering how to crow, but Ella helps him figure it out. The ducklings have their first flying lesson and the friends clean out the pond to give the animals a nice new home. Plus, celebrate the Moon Festival with a special party.

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Ep06 Roz dan Rin diserang. Dia menjejak para penyerangnya ke pangkalan rahsia mereka. Ejen Mah dihantar untuk menyiasat tetapi dia ditangkap. Roz, Datin Seri dan Rin bekerjasama membebaskan Ejen Mah dan Roz dapat mengalahkan Nora, ketua penculik. Tetapi Dr Kaos Jr telah maju selangkah dan bereksperimen dengan senjata barunya.

programme.title: #Tom Tom Bak Series
programme.desc: Datuk Aznil Haji Nawawi turun padang sempena pencarian bakat baru #TomTomBak. Ramai yang hadir untuk menonjolkan bakat yang mereka ada. Bermacam ragam And aksi lucu dapat kita saksikan. Anak-anak yang petah berborak juga turut dicari untuk musim terbaru ini.

programme.title: Geng Gajet
programme.desc: Mesin pencetak kedai Bob tiba-tiba rosak dan perlu diperbaiki. Aly dan geng mesti bergabung bersama untuk memperbaikinya untuk pelanggan. Namun, Nabil dan Eu Jin tidak hadir kerana mereka obses terhadap Akses Premium untuk permainan yang mereka mainkan.

programme.title: Oh My English!
programme.desc: Di SMK Ayer Dalam, Kelas 3 Merah terkenal sebagai kelas yang mempunyai berbagai kerenah. Pelajar-pelajarnya nakal, suka buat bising. Subjek yang mereka paling tidak gemar ialah Bahasa Inggeris.

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: well be seeing the best penguin fails, p-p-p-party penguins, well get up close and personal with wild animals, and well go on safari. well also meet angry animals living the thug life, some crazy critters, and well watch sporty animals in action.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: Join us at the Dog Rescuers house as host Alan Davies throws the ultimate Christmas party for his doggy friends. This years Dog Rescuers Christmas Special follows Inspector Lauren Bailey as she journeys to Lapland on an arctic adventure to discover how one winter wonderland dog sled organisation is blazing a trail for the welfare of working Husky Dogs.

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: Dachshund, prince of the dog world and American pitbull, the gangster boss compete to see who is the cutest? There are many problems when taking your dog out for a walk, pet trainer teaches your dog to walk well in 3 steps! What are the precautions for daily care of dogs dog owners are most concerned about? Remember to deworm regularly to give them a fullout protection! Lets make a nutritious fresh pet food cake together! Tainans first leisure farm designed specifically for pets, keep your furry friends entertained through spring outings and play in the water!

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: This week finds Dr. Matt grappling with wild cats, a juvenile delinquent donkey, too many male lemurs and a penguin with a eye problem.

programme.title: My House And Other Animals
programme.desc: Meet the modern-day Dr Doolittles with a passion for all creatures great and small: the unsung heroes of the wildlife world, whose homes have become havens for every animal imaginable.

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Because of her love for cats, Claire carefully created a place called There is a Cat at the Corner. While enjoying your meals and drinks, more than a dozen beautiful cats are strolling freely in the store, waiting to interact with you up close and enjoy a slow life with you. However, if you want to pet the cat yourself and win their favor, you must first understand the nature and preferences of cats! Claire also generously shares her experiences in ruling over dozens of cats, which is extremely precious. Novice cat lovers should come and have a look!

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: well be seeing the best penguin fails, p-p-p-party penguins, well get up close and personal with wild animals, and well go on safari. well also meet angry animals living the thug life, some crazy critters, and well watch sporty animals in action.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: Join us at the Dog Rescuers house as host Alan Davies throws the ultimate Christmas party for his doggy friends. This years Dog Rescuers Christmas Special follows Inspector Lauren Bailey as she journeys to Lapland on an arctic adventure to discover how one winter wonderland dog sled organisation is blazing a trail for the welfare of working Husky Dogs.

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Dr. Matt tries to perk up Spike the iguana whos down in the dumps and he meets the latest fascinating additions to the aquarium the magical but very endangered seahorses. But he also faces every vets nightmare during an operation on a budgie.

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: Weve scoured the internet to bring you the most hilarious clips of Budgies (and other birds) on the planet, not so much -whos a clever boy- as -whos a funny boy-! Flying fails, performing Parrots and the real life angry birds -V weve assembled the very best the web has to offer, guaranteed to make you laugh out loud.

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Brother Hui, who runs an amphibian and reptile store in Xinxing District, Kaohsiung City, has a wide range of knowledge in the field of reptiles. He started with red-eared sliders and gradually got in touch with tortoises, lizards, snakes and other reptile pets. In Brother Huis brick-and-mortar store, the most special existence is the two store pets, the South American lizards. The male is called Meatball and the female is called Porkball. How did their fate with Brother Hui begin? Brother Hui, who has many years of experience in raising South American lizards, also generously share his breeding secrets. How to distinguish male and female South American lizards? How to keep them healthy? Whats the secret to taming them? In this epsiode, we unpack the living environment of South American lizards and reveal the breeding guide!

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: From Christmas as youve never experienced it before, with out-of-tune carol singers, Santa getting stuck, ungrateful children and exploding Christmas puddings - to OAPs, kids and even blundering burglars, six brand spanking new topics are given the trademark LOL treatment, combining user-generated footage with comic narration by comedian Iain Lee. Theres a treat too for animal lovers with a Puppies special featuring some of the cutest, as well as funniest, puppy clips on the web.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: Baxter is a Shih-Tzu that was discovered abandoned in an empty house on the outskirts of Manchester; thin and with extremely matted fur. Inspector Lyndsey Taylor comes to the rescue, but until all that fur is removed, nobody knows what lies beneath.

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: The era of high housing prices shocks the masses. However, some are willing to live in the mountains for their beloved parrots, just to give them the best breeding environment. Parrots have a long lifespan and their IQ is comparable to that of a five-year-old child. How do you make them behave? Training is actually a good way, but how? Melon seeds are key to the goal. If you want to raise a parrot, there are in fact many restrictions on choosing the right one. How should I put it? Dont miss Cute Pet Guide!

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Dr. Matt treats a springer spaniel with a footballers knee injury, and unblocks the nostrils of an African Grey parrot called Rosie and fights to save the life of a sparrowhawk which has been hit by a car.

programme.title: Scruffts
programme.desc: Six dogs, six handlers, all competing in the worlds largest and most famous dog show: Crufts.nnBut they are not the pedigree pooches who compete to be labelled Best in Show. These are the loveable family pets competing to win the Scruffts title.

programme.title: Have A Pet Day
programme.desc: Renowned Golden Bell awarded host Sandy Wu takes her beloved dog Hershey on outings, inviting celebrities and their adorable pets to join in the fun. Beyond exploring nature, the show delves into heartfelt conversations about the journey of pet ownership and shares touching stories amid delightful scenery and cuisine. The program features various enjoyable activities where owners and pets can bond, creating unforgettable memories through laughter and tears.

programme.title: Super Squash
programme.desc: Never underestimate the power of squash: theyre affordable, abundant and they come in all shapes, sizes, colors, and textures. Frankie spotlights squash from summer through winter highlighting their amazing superhero traits.

programme.title: Spooktacular Tricks and Treats
programme.desc: Dont let the line of trick-or-treaters or the candy corn overload scare you out of the kitchen this Halloween. Frankies got tricks up his sleeve to make simple yet wicked good treats for everyone at the party to enjoy. All while saving some dough.

programme.title: Lets Play Ball
programme.desc: Batter up! Fall ball is heating up, and Frankies offering us his favorite stadium snacks, without those major league prices. No matter who youre rooting for, these ballpark classics will be a hit with friends and family for seasons to come.

programme.title: The Future is Flavor
programme.desc: Frankie harnesses the power of time to transform simple ingredients into flavorful goods thatll stick around for a long time. Learn the basics of preserving, pickling And curing to make dinner anything but a struggle. It just takes a little patience.

programme.title: Pantry Pasta
programme.desc: Keep your pantry stocked with a few basic staples, and youll always have ingredients on hand for dinner, especially for pasta night. In this episode, Frankie creates delicious pasta dishes with the kitchens best-kept secret weapon the pantry.

programme.title: Potato Variety Show
programme.desc: Today, Frankies slicing, mashing and smashing his way through the spud species, an essential staple for any Struggle kitchen. Theyve got so many talents and textures that whichever way you dig em, potatoes will never let you down.

programme.title: Christmas In July
programme.desc: Its July on the calendar but Christmas in our hearts. Frankie whips up three summertime twists on Christmas themed dishes and serves up tips and tricks for celebrating the most wonderful time of year in July.

programme.title: We Knead Pizza
programme.desc: Cancel the pizza delivery, its time to save money and build your pies from scratch. With three different pizza styles, youre bound to find one that satisfies your craving without digging into your wallet.

programme.title: Oktoberfest
programme.desc: Join Frankie as he shares his budget friendly takes on Oktoberfest-inspired dishes, perfect for celebrating the fall season with friends. These festive and hearty meals will keep you cozy and full, and best of all, pair nicely with a beer.

programme.title: Sweater Weather
programme.desc: The air is crisp and the leaves are changing, which means its time to gather round the dinner table for hearty, seasonal meals on a budget. These warm dishes are sure to keep you cozy all season long.

programme.title: Happy Halloween
programme.desc: Boo! Its spooky season, and what better way to get into the spirit than with affordable, party-friendly Halloween dishes that scream trick or treat?! But be warned, these meals are scary good.

programme.title: Whole Chicken 101
programme.desc: Join Frankie to learn the ins and outs of using every part of a chicken, as he demonstrates how to maximize the value and minimize waste. By cooking smarter, youll have three delectable recipes to last you the whole week.

programme.title: Frankies Italian Faves
programme.desc: Everyone knows Frankie cant live without pasta, but this week he shares his favorite Italian recipes that dont require any kneading. Add these simple, delicious dishes to your weeknight menu to complete your Italian dish repertoire.

programme.title: Meals Under $7
programme.desc: At a loss when your pantry is empty? With these recipes, you can walk into any grocery store with only $7 and walk out with everything you need for an entire meal. Because yes, you can whip up a nutritious meal at an affordable price!

programme.desc: Give your wallet a break by taking the fine-dining experience straight to the comfort of your home. From tender, juicy steak paired with classic sides, to decadent desserts, Frankies got your date night meal covered.

programme.title: Fancy Pants Pasta
programme.desc: This week, treat yourself to a restaurant-worthy pasta dinner at a fraction of the price, as Frankie cooks up some of his signature dishes featuring show stopping sauces.

programme.title: I Need To Eat Right Now
programme.desc: At the end of a long, hectic day, when you need dinner in a pinch, Frankie unlocks his not-so-secret formula for whipping up quick and easy meals, using minimal ingredients that will satisfy your cravings and feed the family in a flash.

programme.title: Piece Of The Pie
programme.desc: There may be infinite ways to define pie, but the only math that matters is what makes these sweet and savory dishes fit the bill. In true Struggle Style, Frankie rolls out his best tips and tricks for enjoying hassle free, cost friendly pies.

programme.title: The Big Game
programme.desc: Brackets are complete and all thats missing is food to fuel your teams run. Huddle around the kitchen as Frankie preps the ultimate watch party spread. These savory, spicy and sweet dishes are championship-worthy even if your bracket goes bust.

programme.title: Bananas For Bananas
programme.desc: As one of the cheapest members of the produce aisle, bananas will save you bunches of money when you whip up these delightfully appealing recipes that go above and beyond a basic bread.

programme.title: Cry Me An Allium River
programme.desc: Frankie takes on his longtime frenemy, the onion, and all its powerful relatives. There might be a few tears shed along the way, but they are well worth the delicious and flavorful results, from sweet buttery leeks to the ultimate onion masterpiece.

programme.title: 100th Episode
programme.desc: Frankie celebrates the 100th episode of Struggle Meals with a look back on memorable moments, favorite recipes, bloopers and cooking mishaps. Take a peek behind the scenes, hear from the audience, and celebrate with a special surprise guest.

programme.title: Warm + Cozy Winter
programme.desc: Frankie gets cozy in the Struggle kitchen with recipes that bring all the warmth, flavor and joy during the coldest days of winter. From a casual weekday dinner to a special weekend meal, these dishes are sure to keep you warm and cozy.

programme.title: Eggscellent Techniques
programme.desc: In this special technique episode, Frankie teaches us several methods for cooking a quintessential ingredient: eggs. The scramble, the omelet, the Benedict learn to make them just the way you like them.

programme.title: Vintage
programme.desc: Frankie cooks his way back in time with his favorite vintage recipes. These oldie-but-goodie dishes are not only nostalgic and comforting, but theyll also fill you up without costing you a pretty penny.

programme.title: Struggle Soup
programme.desc: Warm and hearty bowls of veggies, beans, pasta, and more, these soups will have you returning for seconds all year round. Frankies soup blueprints can turn everyday ingredients into extraordinary soups, with endless flavor opportunity.

programme.title: Struggle Sandwich
programme.desc: In a sandwich, every component plays a role. With a supporting cast of fixins, and Frankies cost-saving homemade twists, these sandwiches just might steal the show.

programme.title: Cabbage, cabbage, cabbage
programme.desc: Cabbage has long been an underrated green on the field, and its about time Frankie gives it a starring role. This leafy head proves itself as the versatile ingredient we need it to be, affordable year around, delicious and filling.

programme.title: Mayo: The Secret Ingredient
programme.desc: Who knew mayo could be such a savvy secret agent? Its a controversial condiment that can unlock the buttery, crispy, decadent codes of our favorite dishes, without leaving a trace of mayo-ness. Best of all, its easy to make at home!

programme.title: Crunchy
programme.desc: Reaching textural nirvana is never easy, but Frankie explores several ways to achieve the perfect crunch in his dishes, both savory and sweet. Add this elusive element to your recipes without adding cost to your budget.

programme.title: A Cruciferous Delicious Time
programme.desc: No veggie family packs the same nutritious punch as the cruciferous family, and with a shelf life this long, theyve become a fixture in Frankies meal rotation. These delicious and easy-to-make recipes will win everyone over in no time.

programme.title: 5-Ingredient Recipes
programme.desc: Who said struggle meals cant be delicious? Dont sleep on these 5-ingredient recipes simple weeknight meals that are anything but boring, and with a few pantry staples, youll have dinner on the table in no time.

programme.title: 100th Episode
programme.desc: Frankie celebrates the 100th episode of Struggle Meals with a look back on memorable moments, favorite recipes, bloopers and cooking mishaps. Take a peek behind the scenes, hear from the audience, and celebrate with a special surprise guest.

programme.title: One Pot Meals
programme.desc: Any true struggle cook knows theres nothing better than a one pot dinner. Not only is there hardly any cleanup at the end, but the prep is minimal too, which means hunger satisfaction is imminent. Who says meals cant be cheap, easy and delicious?

programme.title: Homemade-ish
programme.desc: Last minute company leaving you in a pinch? Frankie has you covered with these easy recipes featuring store bought staples. With a few Struggle tips, these basic ingredients can be transformed into dishes that will impress your guests.

programme.title: Eat Your Greens
programme.desc: Going green isnt just a trend; its a no-brainer! When the veggies are in season and the prices are at their lowest, Frankies colorful recipes and zero waste tips will have you celebrating the savings with fresh spring produce.

programme.title: Between Two Buns
programme.desc: Is it a burger? Is it a sandwich? Is a burger a sandwich? Not even Frankie knows the answer, but one thing is certain: whatever you want to call them, these fun twists and familiar flavor combos are super satisfying to scarf down.

programme.title: Struggle Splurge
programme.desc: The key to treating yourself on a budget is to keep it simple: these elegant dinners taste like restaurant specials, but they can be prepared in under one hour perfect for easy weeknight meals for a family of any size on a busy schedule.

programme.title: But First, Brunch
programme.desc: Bring your loved ones together over a delicious brunch spread made with love. Whether youre celebrating a major milestone or simply toasting to the weekend, Frankies money-saving menu will have guests buzzing for more.

programme.title: Saved By The Bowl
programme.desc: When youre craving a quick nutritious meal, say no more to throwing cash down the gutter for overpriced takeout bowls! Frankie recreates three restaurant favorites for a fraction of the cost, sparing your bank account without sacrificing flavor.

programme.title: Summer Cookout
programme.desc: Soak up summer with the ultimate outdoor cookout, featuring smashburgers, pasta salad and scrumptious sweets. These classic dishes can be prepared indoors or out, making them the perfect recipes for backyard dinner parties on warm summer nights.

programme.title: Picnic Lunches
programme.desc: Its field trip day, and Frankie shows off his best handheld lunches perfect for leisurely days at the park, the beach or the pool. These sturdy meals are made to travel and only get better with time.

programme.title: Too Hot To Cook
programme.desc: When the temps are soaring and turning on your stove or oven is not even an option, Frankies no cook meals will blow you away. Enjoy refreshing, nourishing dishes that will help keep you cool all summer long.

programme.title: Wrap it Up!
programme.desc: First, Frankie packs a one-two punch of bargain and nutrition with butternut squash in three nostalgic, old school dishes. Then he shows you how to prep portable wraps at home for easy, peasey lunches.

programme.title: Bacon My Heart
programme.desc: Versatility is important. These three items - bacon, eggs, and a whole chicken - will feed you a plethora of delicious meals... and for cheap!

programme.title: Instant Gratification
programme.desc: Everyone loves carbs! Endlessly versatile, cheap, and super filling - Frankie shows you tricks for pasta, pizza dough, and delicious, easy ramen meals that arent soup.

programme.title: Cauliflowers Star Power
programme.desc: Cauliflower is a star and can be transformed into unexpected dishes. Plus its delicious and nutritious! Frankie reminds us to buy dried-goods in bulk and makes a big chuck roast that stretches over three dishes.

programme.title: Traveling for Your Tastebuds
programme.desc: You dont have to travel half way around the world to try a different cuisine - Italian and Filipino foods are accessible right here, right now.

programme.title: Street Food Faves at Home
programme.desc: Frankie makes street food at home. Its fresher, healthier, and cheaper! Then - get ready! - because youve never seen rice like this before.

programme.title: 100th Episode
programme.desc: Frankie celebrates the 100th episode of Struggle Meals with a look back on memorable moments, favorite recipes, bloopers and cooking mishaps. Take a peek behind the scenes, hear from the audience, and celebrate with a special surprise guest.

programme.title: Game Day
programme.desc: Frankie throws a game day party for under $25. He makes three no-fuss appetizers that are cheaper, healthier, and tastier than subpar game day take out. So gather around with friends and cheer on your favorite teams. Or just eat. Both are a win.

programme.title: Winter is Here
programme.desc: Its the dead of winter in Frankies kitchen, which means its that time for hearty, delicious, and warming homemade meals. So youre saving more money, while youre staying in, already saving money. Its a winter miracle.

programme.title: Valentines Day
programme.desc: Frankie prepares a Valentines Day dinner for under $15. Why go to a crowded restaurant for an overpriced prix-fixe menu when you can prep a simple yet decadent romantic meal at home? Itll be sweet, itll be aphrodisiacal, and itll be sexy cheap.

programme.title: Beans Beans Beans
programme.desc: Frankie will teach the basics of preparing beans from scratch while making super tasty recipes. Beans are the gift that keeps on giving, so dont be scared to eat too many. Remember, theyre good for your heart.

programme.title: Rent Week
programme.desc: Its the first of the month, when you spend your whole paycheck on rent and bills. Your fridge is looking pretty sad and the grocery budget is low. Frankie cooks up some go-to pantry meals and teaches us how to better prep for this time of the month.

programme.title: Mushroom Mania
programme.desc: Frankie takes us on a magical mushroom trip. Theyre an affordable plant-based meat replacement, packed with nutritional value. Well learn all things mushrooms and how to make inventive, flavorful dishes that might trip you out on their awesomeness.

programme.title: Taste Selebriti
programme.desc: A food-travelogue program where 13 local celebrities will return to their hometowns to share traditional cuisines, unique foods and popular dishes in their states.

programme.title: Travel Lawak
programme.desc: Sebuah program travelog yang menampilkan tiga pelawak popular iaitu Syuk, Sharif Zero, dan Mamak Puteh di mana mereka akan mengembara ke luar negara.

programme.title: Semmaiyaana Saapadu
programme.desc: A mom and her daughters modernize traditional cooking with healthier versions of beloved recipes, serving up nostalgia with a nutritious twist.

programme.title: Kak Kek Ke Kelate
programme.desc: Join alter ego Catriona Ross as she uncovers the most popular dishes, iconic locations, hidden gems and, as always, the vibrant people on her travels throughout Kelantan.

programme.title: RASA Anak Emak Anak Bapak
programme.desc: Program masakan ini memerlukan selebriti jemputan membawa ibu atau bapa mereka menjelajah Malaysia bagi merasa sendiri masakan kegemaran ibu bapa masing-masing.

programme.title: Garden of Treasure
programme.desc: Buckle up as Darren takes us back on the road in this new season! Join him as he discovers herb gardens filled with treasures across Malaysias farms And markets - and scales the mountains of East Malaysia, searching for the medicinal herbs used by the aboriginal people And local Chinese.

programme.desc: A married couple unwittingly become involved in a rescue operation of a hijacked aircraft during their first-ever family trip abroad to Hawaii.

programme.title: Honeysweet
programme.desc: Chi-ho is a successful product designer. Il-young works in a loan company. They meet at her company when he try to pay his brothers debt. Coincidence brings them to become closer.

programme.title: Switch
programme.desc: The life of a top star actor was turned upside down when he meets a taxi driver on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: The Exclusive: Beat the Devils Tattoo
programme.desc: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.

programme.title: A Year-end Medley
programme.desc: From awkward first love to crush on a friend and long forgotten love, 14 love-struck individuals are brought together at Hotel Emross on New Years Eve.

programme.title: Big Match
programme.desc: A man framed for murder battles a game planner who is intent on turning a city into one giant game board that he can control.

programme.title: Homeward Bound
programme.desc: Jung-has peaceful life changes when her son Jin-woo, who studies in Canada, and his girlfriend Jenny show up. They are forced to live together after a mishap with their lodging, and secrets surface.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E37
programme.desc: Ezequiel rechazado por Camila, la manipula con una nueva oferta de trabajo como asistente de su hija Julia y todo para tratar de conseguir su cercana. Max, confa en el amor de Camila. Torrealba pide que unan esfuerzos para encontrar a Rosa Blanco.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E38
programme.desc: Ante las intenciones de Ezequiel, Octavia y Marcelina agreden verbalmente a Camila. Max le propone y Camila duda pero accede a casarse con el. En una cena, Ezequiel rene a sus hijos y Camila ser la homenajeada especial.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E56
programme.desc: Para desagrado de Pastora y Edilio, Cirilo acepta la oferta de Israel, manejarn juntos el imperio de los Santa Mara.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E57
programme.desc: En una mezcla de disfrute y dolor, Pastora comprueba que el cadver de Cirilo reposa en la morgue.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E56
programme.desc: Omar cree que Lorena se infiltro en casa de los Corona para dar informacion al sicario. Ante el Juez Montilla, Isabel admite haber matado a su hermano - Claudio y Lorena van de salida cuando son sorprendidos por Omar, quien viene acompaado de dos policas; el Comisario, muy a su pesar, le informa a Lorena que est detenida.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E53
programme.desc: Debil, Cesar intenta continuar su huida, mientras le ruega a Dios que le de fuerzas.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E54
programme.desc: Intentando zafarse de la locura de Cesar Adriana le pide al joven que se marche pero el hombre le exige que le diga cundo regresar a su lado.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E55
programme.desc: Despues de conversar con Carlos Ral, Adriana llega deshecha a su casa cuando es sorprendida por Cristian, quien saca un revolver y la amenaza para que se vaya con el.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E018
programme.desc: Hilario queda sorprendido al enterarse que Victoria ha decidido regresar a la ciudad con Hansen pues, segn ella, debe ir en busca de su verdad. Nicols asegura a Fernanda que avisarle a Victoria lo que iba a pasar con los novillos era parte de su plan para ganarse su confianza. Victoria le pide a Adelaida que le diga si es cierto que Hilario mato a Jaimito Del Casal; la seora asegura a su hija que ella cree en la inocencia de su esposo aunque Fernanda no comparta su opinion y la insta a decidir si va a creer o no en su padre. Clementina aconseja a Victoria que se busque otro enamorado que la ayude a olvidarse de Nicols.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E019
programme.desc: Fernanda impide que Nicols siga espiando la conversacion entre Jons y Builder. Una emocionada Antonieta comenta con Fernanda que existe la posibilidad de salir en la pelcula que va a filmar Jack aunque sea como extra, cosa que la hace muy feliz, pues todas sus amigas de la alta sociedad se van a morir de envidia.Victoria se finge furiosa ante Adelaida al recibir un ramo de flores que le enva Nicols, aunque, a solas, admite que se muere por perdonarlo.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E37
programme.desc: Ezequiel rechazado por Camila, la manipula con una nueva oferta de trabajo como asistente de su hija Julia y todo para tratar de conseguir su cercana. Max, confa en el amor de Camila. Torrealba pide que unan esfuerzos para encontrar a Rosa Blanco.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E38
programme.desc: Ante las intenciones de Ezequiel, Octavia y Marcelina agreden verbalmente a Camila. Max le propone y Camila duda pero accede a casarse con el. En una cena, Ezequiel rene a sus hijos y Camila ser la homenajeada especial.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E57
programme.desc: En una mezcla de disfrute y dolor, Pastora comprueba que el cadver de Cirilo reposa en la morgue.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E58
programme.desc: Lara Portillo dispone comprar unas pruebas de ADN que digan que la joven no lleva en sus venas la sangre de ninguno de los Santa Mara.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E57
programme.desc: Omar va a proceder al arresto de Lorena, pero Claudio interviene. En el apartamento de Isabel, Patricia exige que las mujeres le digan toda la verdad de lo que paso; tanto Malena como Isabel mantienen la version acordada; la abogada piensa que algo le ocultan- Gertrudis, festiva, gloriosa, le informa a Norma que pronto se casar con Claudio - Paulina pone a Don Lucio al tanto de lo que est ocurriendo con Virginia.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E58
programme.desc: Pedro, seguro de que Lorena fue su delatora, enva a dos de sus sicarios a hacerse cargo de la enfermera - Lorena va rumbo a la universidad, cuando una camioneta frena violentamente delante de ella y se bajan Quique y Emilio, los secuaces de Pedro, con el rostro cubierto con unos pasamontaas; con pericia someten a la joven y luego se pierden a toda velocidad. Lorena ha sido secuestrada.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E56
programme.desc: Adriana llega a casa de los Perroni y all Cristian la recibe con un apasionado beso, mientras que Carlos Ral los observa con dolor.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E019
programme.desc: Fernanda impide que Nicols siga espiando la conversacion entre Jons y Builder. Una emocionada Antonieta comenta con Fernanda que existe la posibilidad de salir en la pelcula que va a filmar Jack aunque sea como extra, cosa que la hace muy feliz, pues todas sus amigas de la alta sociedad se van a morir de envidia.Victoria se finge furiosa ante Adelaida al recibir un ramo de flores que le enva Nicols, aunque, a solas, admite que se muere por perdonarlo.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E020
programme.desc: Eugenia se siente incomoda cuando Miguel evidencia que gusta de ella y asegura estar dispuesto a conquistarla. Clementina le entrega a Victoria un ramo de flores que acaba de traerle un mensajero y que le enva Builder; la joven Guanipa evidencia preferir el de Nicols. Nicols se presenta en casa de Carmencita a avisarle a Victoria lo ocurrido a Hilario; la muchacha advierte que ya estaba enterada y que a su padre no le paso nada antes de reprocharle el beso que le estuvo dando a Liliana esa maana y que ella vio en una foto. Nicols busca a Victoria en la universidad para asegurarle que est dispuesto a hacer cualquier cosa por reconquistarla, pues para el no existe ms nadie; Guanipa, orgullosa, lo trata con cierto desprecio y, frente a el, llama a Builder para aceptar la invitacion que le hiciera anteriormente.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E38
programme.desc: Ante las intenciones de Ezequiel, Octavia y Marcelina agreden verbalmente a Camila. Max le propone y Camila duda pero accede a casarse con el. En una cena, Ezequiel rene a sus hijos y Camila ser la homenajeada especial.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E39
programme.desc: En la cena, el tema principal ser Rosa Blanco. Ezequiel dice que esa mujer fue una oportunista que enamoro y se aprovecho de su hermano menor, Leoncio. Astrid ofende agregando que fue una prostituta, culpable de la guerra entre las dos familias por su relacion con Augusto Aragon y tambien con Leoncio Lopez.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E58
programme.desc: Lara Portillo dispone comprar unas pruebas de ADN que digan que la joven no lleva en sus venas la sangre de ninguno de los Santa Mara.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E59
programme.desc: Frente a los medicos, Pastora finge interes por la condicion de Clara Ines, Clara le toma con fuerza el brazo acusndola de lo que le ha pasado.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E58
programme.desc: Pedro, seguro de que Lorena fue su delatora, enva a dos de sus sicarios a hacerse cargo de la enfermera - Lorena va rumbo a la universidad, cuando una camioneta frena violentamente delante de ella y se bajan Quique y Emilio, los secuaces de Pedro, con el rostro cubierto con unos pasamontaas; con pericia someten a la joven y luego se pierden a toda velocidad. Lorena ha sido secuestrada.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E59
programme.desc: Luego de ser sometida y secuestrada, ya dentro de la camioneta, Lorena se encuentra de frente con Pedro Lobo quien la acusa de traidora; ella sabe que est en peligro de muerte. Alberto y su to llegan al anticuario; al ver a este ltimo la empleada intenta avisarle a Pedro, pero Claudio se adelanta y se muestra como un cliente cualquiera que pisa por primera vez la tienda.

programme.desc: Despues de conversar con Carlos Ral, Adriana llega deshecha a su casa cuando es sorprendida por Cristian, quien saca un revolver y la amenaza para que se vaya con el.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E38
programme.desc: Ante las intenciones de Ezequiel, Octavia y Marcelina agreden verbalmente a Camila. Max le propone y Camila duda pero accede a casarse con el. En una cena, Ezequiel rene a sus hijos y Camila ser la homenajeada especial.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S01:E03 - Up with the Gods - Himalayan Tahr
programme.desc: Mario teams up with good friend and precision rifle expert Bernard and heads into the high alpine mountains above New Zealands rugged West Coast. Drawing on his Greek roots, Mario cooks a rustic Kleftiko dish in an earth oven.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S01:E04 - Outback Odyssey
programme.desc: In one of the harshest environments on the planet, Mario travels to the outback desert of Australia in search of feral camels that have been running rampant. What seemingly feels to be a a simple task quickly turns into one of the hardest and most unexpected challenges he has taken on. With a bow in hand and scorching heat he explores the great dividing range, in hope of harvesting one of these middle eastern based beasts.

programme.title: Sasquatch Mountain Man - S05:E09 - Trapping Part 2
programme.desc: La caza con trampas en invierno requiere habilidades diferentes a las de la caza con trampas en primavera. Laramy saca todos los trucos para atrapar bichos.

programme.title: Sasquatch Mountain Man - S05:E10 - Idaho Deer
programme.desc: Laramy caza la cola blanca de montaa en las empinadas subidas de Idaho. Cazar estas montaas a la antigua usanza supone un tremendo desafo.

programme.title: Sasquatch Mountain Man - S05:E11 - Hide and Tanning Show
programme.desc: Un verdadero hombre de campo utiliza cada parte de la presa, y Laramy nos muestra por que el desollado y curtido es una parte tan importante de la vida del hombre de montaa.

programme.title: Sasquatch Mountain Man - S05:E12 - The Hunt of a Mountain Man 2
programme.desc: Laramy nos muestra como cazaban a mediados del siglo XIX los Hombres de la Montaa, que necesitaban habilidades y tecnicas de acecho poco comunes para sobrevivir durante el invierno. Los duros inviernos eran conocidos como la Muerte Blanca por los Hombres de las Montaas.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S02:E07 - Sold into Slavery
programme.desc: Ivan est investigando el comercio ilegal de carne de caza en Kinshasa, cuando se topa con tres cras de chimpance cautivas que se venden en el mercado negro. Se planea un dramtico rescate en el que los chimpances son entregados sanos y salvos a un lugar dedicado a proporcionar un futuro mejor a todos los primates de frica.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E01 - Koala
programme.desc: This series is a unique look at the early life and development of young animals, edited and narrated from the viewpoint of the animals themselves. As children explore the wonders of animal life, their natural fascination will deepen into a true love and appreciation of animals. In the first episode we meet Koala.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E02 - Gazelle
programme.desc: We gazelles live on the Savannah in Africa. Mummy said, that the Savannah is a very dry place. My dad has big horns so he can fight to protect us because lions want to eat us. We must be careful even by the river because crocodiles are watching. We eat mainly dry grass and if its not too dry we dont need to drink much.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E03 - Sea Lion
programme.desc: We live in the ocean! Its huge and wet. But mainly we live on the ocean shore. Thats where all the seal families make their home. What we love the most is swimming! Water is the greatest fun in the world. We have no problem staying in the water for hours at a time. Together with dolphins, we love to jump into the waves. Look at us go! Isnt that awesome?

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E04 - Brumby
programme.desc: I am a wild horse who lives in Australia. We were born to run and the difference between me and a farm horse is that I can run freely where I want. I meet with my friends the donkeys and lizards at waterholes which are very precious for us. But watch out! We dont like to be pushed around or feel threatened.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E05 - Butterfly
programme.desc: We Monarch Butterflies have to chew our way from our egg to see the world. Bite by bite together, with my brothers and sisters we start to feed on the leaves. We dont have any parents but just know what to do. When we feel cold, hungry, or afraid, we feel the same way as you do. We travel a lot and are capable of eating much more than our own weight. Our life is definitely hard work.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E06 - Pelican
programme.desc: There are many pelicans in the world. We are Australian pelicans. But we dont live only in Australia. We also live in other parts of the world. Pelicans like to hunt together. We hunt as a team. We swim in the water in a flock making noise with our feet and wings, thats how we drive the fish into shallows where we easily catch them. Flying is very easy for us and our nests are built from grass stems.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E07 - Elephant
programme.desc: Unsere Heimat ist Afrika und wir haben auch Verwandte in Indien. Aber das hier ist Afrika. Wir haben viele Freunde, die hier mit uns leben. Seht ihr? Gazellen, Antilopen, Gnus....sie alle fressen nur, was aus dem Boden wachst. Elefanten lieben es, im Wasser und im Schlamm zu spielen. Wir werfen den Schlamm umher und spritzen uns das Wasser uber den ganzen Korper. Aber pass auf! Wir wollen nicht auf die Lowen treffen.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E08 - Tern
programme.desc: We live by the water and build our nests in the sand on the shores. We like to live all together in a flock. We terns are able to fly soooooooo long above the ocean without landing. If we dont need to, we might not land at all. Flying is a blast! There are lots of different subspecies of tern. And were going to visit some of them today. We are all related. Its kind of like being in a big family.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E09 - Ants
programme.desc: Im a Green Tree Ant and I mainly live in the forests of Australia. We ants are incredibly strong, built for working hard and long. We must all work within the community to survive. We dont do anything just for fun and we always think about all the other ants and what is good for us all. We have to fight together for our place in the forest and to protect the most important ant in our community which is our queen.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E10 - Sea Horse
programme.desc: In the seahorse family, it is the daddy who gives birth to us. He carrys us in his sac, until we hatch from the eggs our mommy lay into his sac. There are various species of seahorse. Thats why we come in different sizes and shapes. Some live bound to the corals, because the marine currents are very strong. We love exploring the waters we live in.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E11 - Bear
programme.desc: We bears live a solitary life but when it comes to hunting we take it as a reunion. We love to catch and eat fish in the river where we spend a lot of our time but the forest is also our home. We have a lot of animal neighbours such as buffalos, seagulls, coyotes but we never really like to meet with wolves. Everyone is a bit different, because everyone lives differently. Thats why it is better not mingle with others and stay with your own kind.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E12 - Budgie
programme.desc: We budgies live in Australia. Here youll find everything that budgerigars need: open and broad plains; lakes; rivers; and mainly thousands and thousands of budgerigar friends. I dont know, but its a beautiful life. I like it. Eating grass seeds and chatting with our other beautiful friends makes me happy.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E13 - Cat
programme.desc: Wild cats and domestic cats are all born the same way but their way of life is a bit different. Wild cats eat what they catch. But domestic cats get food from humans. Domestic cats dont have to hunt anymore. This wild cat lives all alone. She must find some hideout against bad weather and predators without any help. Domestic cats like the presence of human and a comfortable home. What is better?
